mapper.insert: insert into studyApply(applyId, stuNo, reason) values(#{applyId}, #{stuNo}, #{reason})
mapper.update: update studyApply set status = 'Y' where applyNo = #{applyNo}
update studyApply set status = 'N' where applyNo = #{applyNo}
update studyApply set reason = #{reason} where applyNo = #{applyNo}
